Background:

Today, it is hard to find someone that does not agree that political conversations over social media are toxic. Regardless, we continue to participate in conversations that are unproductive.

Local politicians have told us that they don’t use social media as a tool to gain a better understanding of their constituents because it is too:

  • Nationalized
  • Rife with trolls, bots, and bullies
  • Unstructured and often difficult to make sense of
    •

    Solution:

    Herd is a platform focused on bringing local problems to light through a user generated prompt & polling system. The data collected on the platform is then visualized and freely shared with the local representatives for the area; allowing politicians who do not have the time or resources to perform analysis to gain valuable insights on what their community needs.

    • Based on our commercialization plan, we estimate that our client is positioned to profit $2.6M over the 5 years following launch.
